name: As the light told
description:
A speedrunning game in the dark, It was just a game I made cause I was bored.

I once stepped in my living room at night and while trying to avoid a table I tought it could be a nice game. It was made with Godot in around 7 days (I could have made it faster tbh).

My best score is 02:43:545 but it is beatable.
